first_translate: water from washing rags... is this really what they’re giving me?
is she serious right now?
she’s being so petty and childish about everything.

hangle: 그래도 가문을 대표해서 전쟁터에서 5년을 산 사람한테… 정말로?
first_translate: and toward someone who represented house green on the battlefield for five years at that...
pfft!
haha! hahaha!
I can’t believe how funny I find all this...
but wait, isn’t that maid...

hangle: 어디서 본 적이 있는 것 같은데…….
first_translate: ...the one I saw earlier today--
ah!
it was her face I saw five years ago too.
the more I look at her, the more familiar she becomes.

hangle: 사생아라고 피오나를 끝없이 괴롭힌 백작부인의 하녀!
first_translate: this must be the same maid who tormented fiona because she was illegitimate!
no wonder...

hangle: 방 하나 좀 제대로 줬다고 좀 방심하다니…
first_translate: I guess getting my own room made me let my guard down...

hangle: 이런 행동이 여전히 묵인되어 이루어진다는 건,
first_translate: if no one stopped them from doing something like this,

hangle: 이 가문이 여전히 날 쓸모도 가치도 없는 사생아로 보고 있다는 뜻.
first_translate: that just goes to show everyone still thinks of me as nothing but an illegitimate child without any value or use.
everyone here seems to think...
...that things are still the way they used to be.
to them, I’m still only thirteen years old,
an illegitimate girl with nowhere else to go,

hangle: 아무런 힘도 없는 반쪽짜리 핏줄만 가진 열 세 살 사생아로 여기고 있어.
first_translate: without money nor power.

hangle: 이런 식으로 환대해 주니 복수심이 다시 타오를 것 같네.
first_translate: treatment like this makes me want revenge again.

hangle: 나야 그렇다치고 내내 고통 받았을 ‘피오나’를 생각하면 더……
first_translate: not just for myself, but also for “fiona,” who suffered through such pain...

hangle: 이대로 두는 건 아닌 것 같아.
first_translate: I don’t think I’ll let this slide anymore.
what...
...was your name again?
allen.
good, allen.
your face looks very familiar.
come to think of it,

hangle: 이 하녀는 나와 똑바로 눈을 마주친다.
first_translate: this maid doesn’t hesitate when looking straight into my eyes.

hangle: 일반적인 귀족 집안이라면 쉬이 허용될 리 없는 일이야.
first_translate: in most noble households, maids wouldn’t dare do anything like that.
the reason why she acts so carelessly...

hangle: 백작 부인의 총애를 믿고, 그녀의 의사를 대변하고 있기 때문이겠지.
first_translate: ...must be because she trusts the countess completely and believes herself to represent her will.

hangle: 백작 부인은 원래도 나를 혐오스럽게 여겼으니…
first_translate: countess green always hated me anyway...

hangle: 상속 문제가 있는 지금은 더더욱 내가 눈엣가시로 보일 거다.
first_translate: now that there's the issue of succession, she probably hates me even more than before.

hangle: 천한 사생아에게 보석 한 알이라도 빼앗길까,
first_translate: the thought of losing their precious jewels to some lowly bastard daughter...

hangle: 그녀뿐 아니라 그린 가문 전체가 그걸로 전전긍긍하고 있을 테지.
first_translate: ...is enough to make not only the countess, but the entire family anxious.
why does she seem so unbothered by this?

hangle: 이 멍청한 사생아가 설마 본인이 모욕당한 줄도 모르는 건가?
first_translate: doesn’t this stupid little brat realize we’re insulting her?
fine then. if you won’t understand, I'll have to teach you.

hangle: 백작 부인은 눈물을 쏙 빼서 쫓아내기를 원하신다.
first_translate: lady green wants us to chase you out after making you cry buckets.
fiona green,

hangle: 고작해야 이제 갓 성인이 된 여자애.
first_translate: a mere young woman barely over eighteen years old.

hangle: 운 좋게 살아 돌아와선 가문에 빌붙을 생각인가본데,
first_translate: do you actually think you could come back alive and leech off our household?
you’ve got another thing coming!

hangle: 천한 사생아 따위… 넌 나에 대한 마님의 신임을 두텁게 해줄 기회에 불과해.
first_translate: you’re nothing but a dirty little bastard... you’re merely an opportunity for me to gain lady green’s trust.

hangle: 이 가문에 네 자리따윈 없다는 걸 똑똑히 알려주지!
first_translate: let me remind you once and for all that you belong nowhere near this place!
allen.
I know exactly what you mean.
excuse me?
hmph.

hangle: 고작 이 정도로 울기라도 하려는 건가?
first_translate: are you going to start crying already?

hangle: 자기가 진짜 귀족이라고 착각하고 있던 거 아니…
first_translate: or did you seriously think you were nobility--?
wait...
did she just...
hit me...?!

hangle: 내내 기죽어서 저택 바닥을 기어 다니던 그 피오나 따위가?!
first_translate: how?! fiona would never stand up for herself like that!
as I said yesterday,

hangle: 난 이 집안이 변하지 않은 것 같아서 기뻐.
first_translate: I'm glad to see that nothing has changed around here.
th-this is outrageous!!!
allen.
do you know where you went wrong?
this is strange... normally bastards like her...
especially since she’s smiling,
but somehow,

hangle: 이렇게 숨 막히는 공포가 느껴지는 걸까?!
first_translate: I feel suffocating fear instead!
i-if you keep acting like this,

hangle: 이러면 곤란해지는 건 피오나 아가씨 일걸요?
first_translate: then miss fiona might get hurt.
I shall report this incident immediately to lady green!
when she finds out about this,
she will definitely not sit idl--
argh!
I asked you what you did wrong.
allen, what did you bring me?
u-um...
m-miss fiona’s--
aaaghk!
ooh...
w-what is th-the meaning of this...?!
what are you waiting for, allen?
answer me quickly.
I asked you what you did wrong.
if you refuse to answer properly,

hangle: 내가 지내온 헤일론의 방식으로 대화를 나눠볼까.
first_translate: then perhaps we should talk using hailon customs.

hangle: 헤일론에선 함부로 주인에게 입을 놀리는 사용인의 혀를 자르고는 해.
first_translate: back home, servants who speak rudely to their masters lose their tongues.
so tell me, what happens in the capital?
ugh...
dear lord above...

hangle: 말이 없으니 어쩔 수 없이 헤일론의 방식대로 혀를 자를까?
first_translate: since you aren’t answering, am I supposed to cut your tongue according to hailon custom?
my-my apologies...
klegh!
allen.
who am I?

hangle: 그, 그린 백작가의 피오나 아가씨 이십니다…….
first_translate: y-you are lady fiona of house green...
then what should you do?

hangle: 두, 두 번 다시 주제넘은 짓은 하지 않겠습니다.
first_translate: I-I promise to never act beyond my station ever again.
please forgive m-me...
of course, good job.
do you feel better now?

hangle: 당장 가서 이 사실을 마님께 보고하자.
first_translate: go ahead and run along to inform lady green about this.
I’m sure...
...she’ll take action against me!
where are you going?
I need to clean this mess up first.
listen carefully.
next time you try pulling something boring like this again,

hangle: 그땐 정말 대가를 치러야 할 거야.
first_translate: there will truly be consequences.
I hope you remember that well.
